name: Bobby The Bladder
description:
If you have played through this narrative and would like to provide feedback, please click this link here: https://forms.gle/U2hjJTsyg82EAaVp8 

Bobby the Bladder is an interactive, branching narrative for people with spinal cord injury and their family to learn about bladder maintenance. Click or tap the screen to advance.

Developed at the University of Utah Department of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation, 2021.

Credits

Jessica Adamson
Brandon Rivera-Melo
Thomas Caiyas
Lindsay Humphrey
Danielle Houseman
Dr. Jeffrey Rosenbluth

#narrative #gamesforhealth #games4health #health #rehab #rehabilitation #UHealth #bladder #cartoon #comic
